refnamediv.refpurpose: retrieve the SNI hostname associated with a session

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_SESSION_get0_hostname() retrieves the SNI value that was sent by the client when the session was created, or NULL if no value was sent.
The value returned is a pointer to memory maintained within s and should not be free'd.
